# CRCpp from here: https://github.com/d-bahr/CRCpp

target_sources( ${PROJECT_NAME}
	PRIVATE
		${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/inc/CRC.h
)

target_include_directories( ${PROJECT_NAME}
	PRIVATE
		${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/inc
)
